specific_question: What was our average employee training hours per quarter in Q1 2025?
answer: Average employee training hours per quarter was 12 hours with a 20% increase expected by Q2 2025.
justification: Employee training metrics do not address the core DR Question focus area on CRM solutions
dr_question: How can MediConn Solutions leverage trendy new CRM solutions to improve patient engagement and retention, and what new CRM solutions are expected in 2025?
